product_name: Aquaglide Chinook XP Two Tandem Inflatable Kayak
long_description: This versatile recreational inflatable kayak has a stable, efficient hull that offers plenty of cockpit space and solid paddling performance for a solo paddler, or 2 smaller adults.
short_description: This versatile recreational inflatable kayak has a stable, efficient hull that offers plenty of cockpit space and solid paddling performance for a solo paddler, or 2 smaller adults.
